original_text: “Say to all the people of the land and the priests, ‘When you fasted and mourned in the fifth month and in the seventh, for these seventy years, was it for me that you fasted?
korean_text: 온 땅의 백성과 제사장들에게 이르라 너희가 칠십 년 동안 다섯째 달과 일곱째 달에 금식하고 애통하였거니와 그 금식이 나를 위하여, 나를 위하여 한 것이냐

sentences.original_text: “Say to all the people of the land and the priests,
‘When you fasted and mourned in the fifth month and in the seventh,
sentences.korean_translation: ‘너희가 다섯째 달과 일곱째 달에 금식하고 애통했을 때에,

sentences.original_text: was it for me that you fasted?”
